Params[3]: It's over.
As the arrow hits its mark, a crack spreads on its body like a spiderweb at lightning speed until the Rail Heterozygote disintegrates into nothing but sand, seeping through the gaps onto the railway.
Wonderful... wonderful.
That's... wonderful.
I never thought we could really win against that enemy.
Everyone's safe... Thank goodness...
That arrow, it's not just a one-time thing, is it?
I think it is, in truth, I am already quite tired...
M-miss Bianca! Are you all right?! Please refrain from moving, I'll carry out a full examination immediately!
Looks like it's finally over. What a fantastic display... both the battle and Bianca's final strike.
How about a deal, then? We will provide intel and products that Babylonia will find satisfactory, and in return, you and your team will join us, Gray Raven Commandant.

Params[2]: I don't intend to jump ship.

Params[3]: Is our price not acceptable? I'd recommend against underestimating what Akdilek can do... Should we talk about it some more?
Trying to shrug off my offer? Fine...
Babylonia actually can afford new residents after its expansion. The President is happy to welcome you all there.
I don't think so. We should stay here, right?
Right, we'll all stay here.
That's what we decided, isn't it?
Where's Ashlar, by the way?
Whatever. He's been manipulating us since the beginning... I wonder if the Ascendants have promised him something in return?
Everyone on Akdilek will stay on the Eternal Engine and go forward together.
No matter how long and how much work it will take, I will never, NEVER stop until I fulfill my promise to myself... to take the train to the end of the line, to the "final station."

Params[2]: I... can do that as well!

Params[3]: I can't help but feel like it will come true now that you have said so...
Commandant. Can I call you Commandant?

Params[2]: Haven't you been doing that already?

Params[3]: Thanks, Commandant!
In that case, let's upload our report here, Commandant. The signal's better at this spot.
(Your comms suddenly rings.)
Thanks for your hard work, Gray Raven Commandant.
I've received your mission report. I didn't think you'd finish it in such a short time! Guess I made the right call assigning it to you.
Unfortunately, there's something I have to tell you...
Haha! Of course not. I'm not that cruel.
I'm just here to tell you that we're almost done clearing the surface. Other team are on their way to you.
So you'll have to stay on the train for now until the they are there to pick you up.
I'll notify you when that happens.
Take the chance to enjoy your "exotic" journey! (Laughs) This is your break, after all.
It appears that, Commandant, you are also quite a busy person...
Take the chance to enjoy the "exotic locale"! (Laughs) This is your break, after all.
The food and views on the Eternal Engine are also remarkable wonders.
Perhaps you will change your mind about my offer after you have experienced them.
